ohu wruththiyen wyaparikayek. 1977 di upan chankama dan nawasilanthaye motar karmika injineruwaku lesa katayuthu karanawa. 1984 di upan bala diyani yasanjali wiwaha wi panapitiye padinchiwa sitinawa. 1979di yalith ohuta jarmaniyata adhi shishyathwayak labuna. 1980 di lankawata pamini nandasena yalith ekwune jarmanu thakshanika aayathanayatamayi.
